TopicTitle: Restore missing parts when using Tech Tree and added new mods

Articles.Content:
Not sure if this is possible.  There is an issue which I think I'm experiencing, in which if you have a modded game which includes a modded tech tree (not sure if that's part of the issue), when you add a new mod with new parts to the game, those parts don't show up.  

I don't know if the issue is that  they don't' show up in the R&D or if in the editor.  Either way, does anyone know how to fix this, or even if it's still a thing.

Thanks

 

LGG
Is it as simple as the new parts not being configured for the modded tech tree? Maybe uninstall/reinstall the tech tree mod and delete your MM caches and see if they show up after that?

1 hour ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

Is it as simple as the new parts not being configured for the modded tech tree? Maybe uninstall/reinstall the tech tree mod and delete your MM caches and see if they show up after that?

It’s an old problem which happens when you add new parts after a game has started.  Nothing to do with MM caches.  You did raise a good point, though, I’ll create a new game and check the science so I can replicate the purchased tech nodes, then compare the two and see if anything is missing
